tool_description:
NLP analysis on world's financial media.
Provides NLP summarization of articles and sentiment for given article. 
Articles can be filtered based on their published time, related symbol, etc.
title: Sentiment on markets

api_list.name: Article sentiment
api_list.description: Return sentiment of article by given id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentiment-on-markets1.p.rapidapi.com/rapid-api/articles/{id}/sentiment"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentiment-on-markets1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Article summary
api_list.description: Return summary of article by given id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentiment-on-markets1.p.rapidapi.com/rapid-api/articles/{id}/summary"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentiment-on-markets1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

payload.article_title: Wide Band Gap Semiconductors Market to Attract Value of US$ 9.5 Billion by 2031, States TMR Study
payload.summary:
Surge in the use of wide band gap semiconductor materials in industrial and commercial applications is driving the market growth
WILMINGTON, Del., Aug. 29, 2022 /PRNewswire/ -- The global wide band gap semiconductors market is prognosticated to expand at a CAGR of 24.6% during the forecast period 2022-2031, according to assessment by Transparency Market Research (TMR).
Furthermore, the market for wide band gap semiconductors is expected to reach a value of US$ 9.5 Bn by the end of 2031.
This factor is leading to revenue-generation avenues in the global wide band gap semiconductors market, note researchers of a TMR study.
The wide band gap semiconductors market in Asia Pacific is projected to attract sizable avenues for growth during the forecast period.
The Asia Pacific market growth is ascribed to several important factors including increase in the use of energy-efficient semiconductor devices in varied end-use industries such as IT & telecoms, consumer electronics, and automotive industry.
Moreover, rise in the use of mobile internet services, energy and utility devices, and smartphones in the region and the presence of favorable government policies in the region are fueling the expansion of the Asia Pacific wide band gap semiconductors market, state analysts at TMR.
Moreover, increase in wide band gap semiconductor applications across large, high-efficiency data centers is leading to profitable prospects in the market, note analysts at TMR.
This factor, in turn, is expected to result into the growth of the global wide band gap semiconductors market share during the forecast period, as per the study by TMR.
Surge in the demand for electric vehicles across many developed and developing nations around the world is propelling the wide band gap semiconductors market
Wide Band Gap Semiconductors Market: Key Players
View original content:https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/wide-band-gap-semiconductors-market-to-attract-value-of-us-9-5-billion-by-2031--states-tmr-study-301613102.html

api_list.name: Articles list

optional_parameters.name: all_tickers_mentions
optional_parameters.description: Only in conjunction with 'tickers' filter. By default, only articles specifically written about selected tickers are included. With this option enabled, all related articles are included, even when ticker is only mentioned in content.

optional_parameters.name: date_to
optional_parameters.description: Only return articles older than this date. Format %yyyy-%mm-dd.

optional_parameters.name: tickers
optional_parameters.description: Only return articles related to specified tickers. Specify list of tickers ID, separated by ',' (comma).

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Sort feed chronologically from most recent to oldest or vise versa.
Sorting is based on value of attribute 'published_at'.
Default is DESC.

optional_parameters.name: date_from
optional_parameters.description:
Only return articles newer than this date. Format %yyyy-%mm-dd.
Defult value is last 14 days
